website_summaries.verdict: A fixed broadhead that delivers a terrific combination of precision and strength.
pros: Boasts a heavy-duty 3-blade design for excellent durability and precision
Offers a wonderful choice for target practice and hunting alike
Much sharper than many similar broadheads
cons: Accuracy leaves much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heads work, but are kinda cheaply made. Edges could be sharper. Using my crossbow and 20" bolts, I fired a test shot with this broad head and the flight path was erratic. I went to archery range with my practice bolts with field tips and 4 hunting bolts with the these broad heads. The field tips flew straight and the these broad tips were erratic. Found out from the guy at Cabelas that these tips are better for compound bows and are better for longer arrows and not recommended for the short crossbow bolts. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12Pack 3 Fixed Blade Archery Broadheads 125
customer_reviews.text: 12Pack 3 Fixed Blade Archery Broadheads 125 are affective and do the same as the high dollar broadheads do. I was very cautious, but for the price was well worth the risk. I was definatley amazed that they were so effective as the same big stores carry. This have been bought and used and shot deer with these broadheads. I did go through a double lunged doe and hit a rock on the other side and mangled the tip, but I was hunting deer and not rocks lol. They work great for deer hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money 100% worthless
customer_reviews.text: If/when one of the blades come loose its near imposssible to get all 3 blades to lock back into place. Lost a 6 point buck on opening day because when i drew my arrow from the arrow rest the blades would come loose and impossible to get them tight again. Pure garbage The blades have no lip on the front tip to lock them into place, they are basically held on by having pressure applied to the 1 cm front lip onto the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I did not get better results from more expensive broadheads
customer_reviews.text: Product is what is advertised. Learned though I'm not a big fan of the arrow drift due to the large surace area of the blades.I did not get better results from more expensive broadheads.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt A. Steirer

customer_reviews.title: Who knows where you will hit.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t test before hunting. Mistake. Cost me a deer. Crossbow I shoot is a Robin Hood. After the miss I came home and shot 2 different broadheads on two different bolts and they were all over the place. One bounced off the ground before the target. Changed out with same weight field point to make sure it wasn’t a bow issue. Hit bullseye with field point of same weight. DON’T BUY THESE cheap Chinese junk. I was trying to save money and cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: great beater heads for target shooting or basic hunting
customer_reviews.text: great beater heads for target shooting or basic hunting. extremely cheap and work well for small game hunting. great to have an extra pack of these while out hunting so you have something to fall back on just in case.
customer_reviews.author: mikeofthemountains

customer_reviews.title: Did the Job!!!!
customer_reviews.text: While I'm know there are better Broadheads out there. I have shot one deer in my life with a crossbow. A few weeks ago this made a massive wound which I was able to track as with any hunting gun or bow shot placement is everything.This will do the job at least it did for me. This was first for me I had always hunted with a rifle never had to track any.
customer_reviews.author: DanmacMo

customer_reviews.title: My tips came dull.
customer_reviews.text: The shipper just tossed all tips into plastic box with no packing. In shipping they rubbed and bounced against each other until dulled and some of the great color got rubbed off. They are true and will kill, but I spent a lot of time re-sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And lethal looking
customer_reviews.text: 40 years ago I was a bow hunter. these were for my indoor gun range. But when these showed up even my cat was afraid. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice blades - the results are in my freezer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. Had the shipping been more reasonable to send a second set, i would have bought more. Either way, I am very pleased with the quality of these razors. They get the job done as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: MZF

customer_reviews.title: Waste money
customer_reviews.text: If your trying to kill game with this please dont... don't waste your bolts or arrows , these heads always shots 4 inches in any directions
customer_reviews.author: stephen keohane

customer_reviews.title: You get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These came in time. Not impressed though. They look good and everything but not very consistent flying couple where the same but for the most part they where all over the place but no more then 9 inche spread. You just have to find the one's that shoot the best out of the pack. You get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jake from state farm

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Blades are falling out, no matter how hard you tighten them. I had to super glue them in. After the company read my review, they said they would reimburse me, so I am geatful for that.
customer_reviews.author: elliott c perry

customer_reviews.title: duds
customer_reviews.text: Arrows are poor quality. When shot the tips fall off and the blades come out. This has happened on all the arrows.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality ! Very sharp edges and good aerodynamic. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: nicolae lambru

customer_reviews.title: Good Broadhead
customer_reviews.text: Flys true, does the job it was designed for. No issues with vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Fighterguy

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!
customer_reviews.text: Not one flew straight. Some were 5 feet wide of the target at 30 yards
customer_reviews.author: Nated14

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a chance to use them yet
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made, more after they are used and that is the reason for a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Adomeit

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I have not use it yet but I have to say it nice. Good solid build and sharp as hell.
customer_reviews.author: S. V.

customer_reviews.title: Blades come off easily after a shot or two if you're lucky
customer_reviews.text: Great fitment and sharp Cheaper quality overall but perfect for target practice and to have as quick spares
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used all kinds of broad heads theses are sharp and stay sharp I took 3 deer with the same broad head pass through shots every time never tracked over a 100 yards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to know the correct bows to get for these tips
customer_reviews.text: Great arrows need to know exactly what they fit onto. I hv a 80lb. Crossbow and my stock bows didnt fit with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S

customer_reviews.title: erratic and inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, these are very poor quality. Inconsistent flight, so basically worthless. The weights are very inconsistent as well. Don't bother, get something that flies true. Don't maim and torture your prey.
customer_reviews.author: Poor Horseman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Never saw a 12 pack of hunting tips for this price. They fit all standard arrows and even crossbow bolts. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerR Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Best deal I can find in fast shipping. They are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: James Widen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for the price and received them in 6 day including 2 Postal holidays from china.

customer_reviews.title: these are good.
customer_reviews.text: I needed some broadheads at that time they where good enough.

customer_reviews.title: Good  N Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but for the price they are great!

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Sharp, but incredibly Dainty! Still, Incredibly Cool Tips, I can take my Turkey home on a Stick!
customer_reviews.text: I am not quite sure if these Broadheads Tips would Survive more than one kill on a Hunt. But, I'm gonna find out.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp Arrow Heads
customer_reviews.text: Very nice arrow tips, sharp as hell, lol cut my finger putting it on a arrow. Havent used em yet, but they seem well made

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used as yet, appear as advertised...inexpensive, fairly sharp, will see if good value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Another satafied customer ...
customer_reviews.text: They are better than what I expected.. My order came in a week early I'm very happy with this product I already starting telling people about the Broadheads 125
customer_reviews.author: Wild Will

customer_reviews.title: ... will be in Tuesday with my arrows they look great the tips r all centered and look sharp the ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet bow will be in Tuesday with my arrows they look great the tips r all centered and look sharp the blades look great and look nice and sharp as well thank u great product will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive broadheads
customer_reviews.text: These broadheads are very nice and well made. Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Shaphran

customer_reviews.title: Better than flint!
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my arrows. I just wish the metal were a bit better quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Only going to get one shot out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Only going to get one shot out of these a piece. They are pretty torn up after there first pass through.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Shipped as promised. Already bagged a deer. They are deadly and fly straight.
customer_reviews.author: Dawgpound

customer_reviews.title: Nice arrowheads
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and feels sharp. I have not used it for target shooting or hunting yet. I will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got my buck this year with these the deer just dropped didn't even run
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent wrong weight  of broadheads  ... Ordered 125 grain  .... received 100 grain.  Colour was as pictured
customer_reviews.text: 100 grain was substituted somehow... I gave them to a neighbor who prefers lighter broadheads.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for the money. Took a while to receive item from China, but won't be using them 'til next season

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time getting these. They are doing well

customer_reviews.title: bad archery
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, head is fall off before use, even can't put back, must return.

customer_reviews.title: Good heads
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with these. It is worth noting that these have standard 8-32 threads as there are some metric threaded bolts and arrows for sale on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LIKE IT VERY WELL. AND AM VERY PLEASED WITH IT
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: One came defective out of the box (was missing a blade) but overall we're very happy with the product and will order again. Would recommend this product to others!

customer_reviews.title: Good Practice Broadheads
customer_reviews.text: Good practice broadheads, but they are bad about wind shear when used with shorter, lighter arrows

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bargain, you can't find this many high quality arrow heads anywhere for such a low price!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality items and best service from seller 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Loual1955

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and great price. I weighed them and they were pretty spot on. Can't tell the difference against higher priced broadheads and pretty sure game animals won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Elbarto

customer_reviews.title: look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: look and feel great...*have not shot these yet* (will update once I do), but I've disassembled and reassembled them and they seem consistently and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Trealee69
customer_reviews.text: They are not rage, but with the right shot I’ll have no problem

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love these told my brother in law and he ordered some

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: blades are good and sharp a grate combination for my 125 grain bolts
customer_reviews.author: JAZER

customer_reviews.title: Bends easily
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Fired from 65lb crossbow, and every single one bent, even the one I shot away from the target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Arrows arrived as expected individually packaged in plastic. Wicked blades, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini527

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: These thing were cheap and they are worth every penny I spent on them and more.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: As good as the expensive ones. work well and do not affect flight as some others do.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super sharp. haven't shot them yet, but seems like it will do the job.

customer_reviews.title: Good over all
customer_reviews.text: They work well just that one of them didn’t come threaded at all couldn’t find a way to contact the company but also don want to return them and wait because I need them for this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: jose b.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tips for light bows blades fall out with fast bows

customer_reviews.title: Time to go hunting
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby and he has not complained so I think they are good
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made hunting tip for a very reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: These hunting broad heads are well made and should do the job just fine. I really appreciate the cost savings purchasing from seller "EMY LTD" and on Amazon! Perhaps I will return later (post hunt) and give my performance opinion. Update: I bought 2 dozen more from different seller "Baien" and they show the exact same review I did on the earlier dozen! I guess review of item is not tied to individual seller when it's the same type item??
customer_reviews.author: Will, the tink

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will use them this season, they are well made and should work well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Bonkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sold broadheads as a retailer and these are well worth the value
customer_reviews.author: Alan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good, small defect
customer_reviews.text: If sunk to deep into the target sometimes the blade will come off (when using 150 lb. pull)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Slinkard

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. Haven't used them hunting yet, but I will be soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Richner

customer_reviews.title: Not well made !! One time use !! I am not impressed !!
customer_reviews.text: Not well made !! One time use !! I am not impressed !!

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Ok Archers, If you have ever been to Walmart and used their cheap broadheads that they sell for $9.99 for three. These are the exact same broad heads. All the broadheads I received weight the same 128 grains and they are sold as 125 grain. They all tuned just perfectly with my arrow. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel hatch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Come quick looks good haven't got to hunt with them will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: threads were no good on one
customer_reviews.text: I had two that were unusable...threads were no good on one...other the tip was so off center I was afraid to use it. Other than that rest are good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Huntingdoor 12Pack3 Fixed Blade Archery is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Firmin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Don't look any further for arrow heads. These are the best deal around.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best value available. These broad heads are VERY well made, razor sharp, no sloppy blade movement, and at a price that is ridiculously low. Iv'e purchased at least 2 packages of these bad boys. They come in a clear blister pack suitable for storage. And yes, they will punch right through mature Elk hide. I have as much confidence in these as I do my Muzzy's.
customer_reviews.author: MeshuggahMan

customer_reviews.title: ... some meat yet but I'm confident they will work great. Be careful with them for they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to put them into some meat yet but I'm confident they will work great. Be careful with them for they are very sharp.Iv'e done a lot of practice using hay bales and they get good penetration. I noticed very little difference in shooting the fixed blade and the practice tips Iv'e been using. Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Untested, but look good.  Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how theses will stand up when shot at wild game, but they sure do look cool. Will update when I get the chance to hunt with them. One note however, the blades are sharper than the tip. I expected a needle sharp tip;I may sharpen the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Savage17

customer_reviews.title: the good: they macerated my target lol
customer_reviews.text: i dont know if i would use these for hunting. but im sure they would work if you were looking for a "disposable" broadhead. shot some into a block target to test out. the good: they macerated my target lol. the bad: after a few shots they were dull.
customer_reviews.author: BINOBINOBINO

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price and it get's the job done. These should basically be for one time use anyways. You can't beat them for the price and as long as your using them correctly and not for shooting at trees you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: WakenBacon

customer_reviews.title: At any rate these are garbage and if you by them your wasting your money
customer_reviews.text: This broadheads are absolutely junk. They are very cheaply made. Any kind of pressure even just putting them on your arrows the blades will just snap off. I used these for my crossbow and had two deer get away. When I retrieved my arrows that went thru both deer all three blade were broke off the both broadheads and they were not in the ground where I pulled them out. I'm assuming they broke when they hit the the hide and done no damage. At any rate these are garbage and if you buy them your wasting your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, and not bad-looking either
customer_reviews.text: Don't attempt to shave with these razors! Unless you're a hunter, shaving the inside of a deer. Then, go ahead. Attempt to shave
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: These are not 125 weight, they are 110
customer_reviews.text: 110 NOT 125. Performance proved that these fly 5 yards further than known 125 weight. Sited 125 at 30 yards flies 35 yards with same shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Giles

customer_reviews.title: Terrible broadheads
customer_reviews.text: These broadheads are very poor quality I shot 2 broadheads into a broadhead target just prior to setting out on this year's opening day archery season and both times the broadheads were destroyed the fixed blades were busted off and the target I shot into was a foam target. So as the old saying goes you get what u pay for would not recommend this product to anyone!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: please don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These broadheads are complete junk. I've shot three of these into a foam practice target and all the blades stayed in the target. $80 target ruined, please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Maybe yours will be better quality?
customer_reviews.text: Fired from a PSE sinister @ 70lbs draw weight and 29.5 length using Easton Nemesis 400 carbon arrows 9.3 GPI @ 29in length with 3 degree offset blazers into a "The Block" target. This is what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Istre

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The priceing is great The blades aren't super sturdy, but it does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: MarylandY's

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that you get what you pay for. Arrows fly so straight with field tips and once I put these broad heads on on watched my arrow flip straight up while in flight. Only thing I will add is that at least it was so cheap that I was not so upset when I lost an arrow because I couldn't find when the broad head took it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Should have known, I only shoot into hay bales or a3D foam target, so far I've broken off Or they just came out (Blades) will not waste my money again.....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: Only took about 8 or 9 days to arrive. I like them they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: really bad quality and really bad idea "just to save money"
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying broadheads made in china, really bad quality and really bad idea "just to save money".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arrow heads
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful arrow heads, used now for over 2 years and these are well made and accurate, bring death to whatever you are hunting. Very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Came impressively sharp.
customer_reviews.text: They all came very sharp. The tip is as sharp as a tack. The blades are pretty sharp. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vivactive

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wicked little things...that's all I can say as of yet. Anxious to get out and use them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

product_meta.title: Huntingdoor 12Pack 3 Fixed Blade Archery Broadheads 125 Grain Arrow Head Hunting Arrow Tips for Compound Bow and Crossbow
feature_bullets: Huntingdoor hunting broadheads,with 3 extremely sharp fixed blade,heavy duty blade design for strength and accuracy,great for outdoor hunting shooting,bring you the ultimate outdoor shooting enjoyment.
Length:7.2 cm/2.8inches.Thickness of blade: 0.4mm.Cutting diameter: 2.74cm.Sharpness: 0.7.Weight:8g/125grain.Package included:12Xhunting broadheads.

Standard screw-in insert thread design, easily install on your carbon arrows fiberglass arrows and aluminium arrows,compatible with all crossbow and compound bow,best replacement hunting arrow tips for hunter beginner and shooter.

Remarkable precision and piercing power,using a unique casting and cutting process,sharp arrow heads and super solid materials,not only makes you shoot more accurately and quickly, but also reduces the pain of the prey.

If you encounter any problems during outdoo hunting or archery practice, please feel free to contact us. We are a professional archery shop, and you are welcome to communicate with us for progress.Happy hunting my friends!
